body.p: Haysville Marion County Ky June the 20th 1861

to the Military Bord we have organised a company Knowen as the Home Guard & have Bin Sworn in & I wish to knowe of you what Proof you wish and to Knowe if you have the arms on hands at Present fiff Knot when we can obtain the guns acording to the Late act of the Legislator Owen County judge is a young officer having Bin Resently Elected and Request me as the commandent of the company to get an answer from you me company is very anctius to get thar arms & we as Ready to comply with the Requsitions of the Lawe in the case so Please answer me at your Earliest convenience So that I ma knowe when we can obtain the arms Direct your answer to Haysville Marion County Ky

yours truly with Respect in hast
Alson Rawlings

5
A. Rawlings
Home Guard
Marion Co
Recd of army 28 June 1861.
